/usr/local/depot/cuda-8.0/bin/nvcc  -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/particle_test.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/particle_test.dir/external/glad/src/glad.c.o -o CMakeFiles/particle_test.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/depot/cuda-8.0/lib64/stubs  -L/usr/local/depot/cuda-8.0/lib64 libparticles.a external/glfw/src/libglfw3.a  -ldl -lpthread -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt
